thread.title: S Marcou

author: S Marcou
title: S Marcou
text: I cannot be more pleased with the service from Watchfinder. Made to feel welcome right from the get go and importantly no pressure to purchase. Genuinely nice people who will take time to not only make you feel welcome but also give lots of insight into the heritage and specifics of their watches. And what a selection they have! If you are looking for that special piece or simply an every day beater i'd highly recommend heading to see Robert at the Royal Exchange in the City.
